definition: a narrow edge of land, usually unpaved, along the side of a road, to push with the shoulders
details:
noun
- a narrow edge of land, usually unpaved, along the side of a road
= example: a narrow edge of land, usually unpaved, along the side of a road
= synonyms: berm
- the part of a garment that covers or fits over the shoulder
= example: the part of a garment that covers or fits over the shoulder
- the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm
= example: the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm
- a ball-and-socket joint between the head of the humerus and a cavity of the scapula
= example: a ball-and-socket joint between the head of the humerus and a cavity of the scapula
= synonyms: shoulder joint
- a cut of meat including the upper joint of the foreleg
= example: a cut of meat including the upper joint of the foreleg
verb
- to push with the shoulders
= example: to push with the shoulders
- to carry a burden, either real or metaphoric
= example: to carry a burden, either real or metaphoric
- to lift onto one's shoulders
= example: to lift onto one's shoulders
